query:
UPDATE initiatives 
SET 
  problemStatement = 'Marketing team spends 15+ hours per week manually creating social media posts for vacation destinations across multiple platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok). This limits posting frequency to 2-3 times per week and delays campaign responsiveness. Content creation bottleneck prevents us from capitalizing on trending destinations and seasonal opportunities.',
  aiApproach = 'Deploy AI content generation tool (e.g., Jasper, Copy.ai) that automatically creates engaging social media posts, captions, and hashtags based on destination data, brand guidelines, and performance analytics. Integrates with existing social media management platform (Hootsuite/Sprinklr). Quick setup using existing AI APIs with minimal custom development.',
  currentWorkflow = 'Manual content creation: Marketing coordinator researches destination → drafts post copy → creates hashtags → reviews with manager → schedules in Hootsuite. Average 45 minutes per post.',
  proposedWorkflow = 'AI-assisted creation: Input destination name → AI generates 3-5 post variations with captions and hashtags → marketer selects/edits best option → one-click schedule. Average 10 minutes per post.',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Eliminates manual copywriting bottleneck, enables 3x posting frequency, allows real-time response to trending topics',
  processOwner = 'Social Media Manager',
  affectedTeams = '["Social Media Team", "Content Marketing", "Brand Management"]',
  primaryMetric = 'time_savings',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Reduce social media content creation time by 70% (from 15 hours/week to 4.5 hours/week)',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: 15 hours/week for 20 posts = 45 min/post',
  successCriteria = 'Achieve 10 min/post average, maintain or improve engagement rates (current: 3.2% avg)',
  measurementMethod = 'Track time spent in content creation tool, monitor engagement metrics in social analytics dashboard'
WHERE title = 'AI Social Media Content Generator';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute UPDATE initiatives
